' Path of disk, the \ at start work with the NA and simulation Public Const SD As String = "\SDCard\" ' Omron standard path of SD card Public Const USB1 As String = "\USBDisk\" ' Omron standard path of USB disk 1 Public Const USB2 As String = "\USBDisk2\" ' Omron standard path of USB disk 2 Public Const FTP As String = "\User\SysmacHMI\FTP\" ' Omron standard path of FTP
' Directory name Private Const RECIPE As String = "Recipes" ' Directory of transfered recipe
''' <summary> ''' Get the recipes path. It finish with "\" ''' </summary> Public ReadOnly Property RECIPES As String Get Return SD & RECIPE & "\" End Get End Property
''' <summary> ''' Check if the SD card is present ''' </summary> ''' <returns></returns> Public Function SD_IsPresent As Boolean
' Check if the SD path is existing Return System.IO.Directory.Exists(SD)
End Function
